trans-unit.source: Specifies how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control behaves when the control resizes.
trans-unit.target: 指定调整 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> 控件大小时该控件上的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> 的行为方式。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property specifies how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is autosized on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>属性指定如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>位于自动调整大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> enumeration and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>枚举以及如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请在窗体中粘贴以下代码。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 调用`InitializeStatusBarPanels`窗体的构造函数中的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: The width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> is determined by its contents.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> does not change size when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control resizes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> 控件调整大小时 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> 的大小不变。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> shares the available space on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> (the space not taken up by other panels whose <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents" />) with other panels that have their <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> property set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> 与那些 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> 的其他面板共享 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None" /> 上的可用空间（即未被那些 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring" /> 的其他面板占用的空间）。
